name: Bed Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Splinter Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The Bed Dragon Wyrmling sends out a shower of wooden splinters in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

notes: A young dragon with wooden features and the ability to breathe splinters. Despite its name, it's not particularly restful to encounter.
description: A medium-sized dragon wyrmling with wooden textures and bark-like scales, capable of breathing deadly wooden splinters.
